[[Category:Monsters]] {| style="background:#f5faff; border:1px solid #cedff2; width:auto; margin: 0px 5%; margin-bottom:1.25em; font-style:italic; text-align:left; color:#000; padding:1.5em 1em;" |- | | style="width: 100%;" | A deep elf skilled at summoning plagues of insidious vermin. |} [[Category:Templates]] ==Useful Info== '''Deep elf summoners''' are fragile [[list of deep elves|deep elf]] [[Summonings]] specialists that tend to flood the screen with all manner of [[Summon Vermin|vermin]]. They appear in packs with other deep elves in the [[Elven Halls]] and some [[bailey]]s. ==Spells== [[Category:Spellcaster]]
{| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0; width:28em;" ! colspan="3" style="font-size:larger;" | Spell set I |- ! align="left" | Slot1 | [[Blink]] | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot2 | [[Summon Vermin]] | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- |}
==Tips & Tricks== When a pack of deep elves shows up, try not to ignore any deep elf summoners that may be present. Although their summons are mostly harmless, they can get in the way of actual threats, and enough of them can leave you dangerously [[poison]]ed. ==History== In [[0.18]], deep elf summoners were removed and [[deep elf mage]]s will be able to summon vermin. Prior to [[0.13]], they knew [[Summon Demon]] and [[Summon Small Mammals]] in place of [[Summon Vermin]]. [[category:Elf]]
